brainly_data.question:
A student is assigned to write a reflective essay on the book "The Grapes of Wrath."

What should the student do after deciding on the topic?

A. brainstorm ideas
B. write the rough draft
C. make a list of main points
D. decide what was most impressive
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question:
A student is assigned to write a reflective essay on the book "The Grapes of Wrath."

What should the student do after deciding on the topic?

A. brainstorm ideas
B. write the rough draft
C. make a list of main points
D. decide what was most impressive
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text:
Hi !


answer C

To write a reflective essay on this book or any other book,
 I would first make a list of main points.

hope I helped :)
